message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm offering it to you for $20000. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique and valuable. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand that $18000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a discount, but I need to make a profit, so I'm thinking more along the lines of $22000. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $22000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $19000 for the product. Can you consider that?

I can see you're serious about this product, and I appreciate that. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $19000. I'm willing to meet you at $21000. It's a fair price considering the value this product brings. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $18500 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?

I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate that. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I can offer it to you for $20500. That's as low as I'm willing to go. Can you consider that?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to pay $18000, but I'm not willing to go any higher than that. Can you seriously consider meeting me at $18000?

I understand you're getting a bit frustrated, but I'm not willing to go as low as $18000. I'm willing to make one final offer, and that's $20000. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider other options. This is my last offer, so please take it seriously.

I've made it clear that I'm willing to pay up to $18000 for this product. I'm not willing to go any higher. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider other options. This is my final offer.
